name: VampySitter
description:
VampySitter

                Made in 72 hours for
                  For Ludum Dare 46
                      "Keep it Alive"

(WASD + Mouse, detailed below or help available
from title screen)

There's a suicidal Vampire loose in his castle!
And you are his... VampySitter!!

He waked up looking for someone to satisfy its unspeakable thirst of BLOOD.

Help him find suitable sacrifices for his
monstruosity.
Move the camera with the malevolent WASD keys. 

Look out for his thirsty meter on the upper 
right corner for its emptiness shall end
Our Vampy's life! Stop reading!  Go for 
Your master's food!

Look out for those Pointy stakes!
Just click them out our vampy's way.

Beware of the deadly pits of hell as the
castle change their location beneath 
the shadows. 
One false step and your vampy-sitting checl
will never be yours.

Luckly you took a Garlic from your momma's kitchen.
Use it to take him away from danger!... or bring him to sweetness.
Use it also to go with your meal somewhere safe and cozy.

If danger lurks too close or suppertime is getting
late you can always "persuade" your vampy
to go rapidly to some direction with your
trusty cross.

Lets keep Vampy alive!

Controls:

WASD or Keys: . . . . Move 
Left click: . . . . . Interact
Q or Right click:  . . Garlic
E or Middle click:. . Cross
or space+right click

R or F11: . . . . . . Restart game
ESC or F12: . . . . . Exit game

3 levels of Slaughter!

- More pits
- Faster stakes
- Get hungry faster
- Goes more by its own if unattended
- Slower auto-find Vampy camera

Warning: Hell awaits only vampire masters
